Information.DownloadMessage:
An artist image will be searched for and downloaded using TheAudioDB.

For best results:
- Ensure the album's name is correct
- Make sure you have a stable internet connection

You will be unable to control playback while the image is downloading.
Information.DownloadNotFound: An artist could not be found with the name '$[1]'. Please check your spelling or set an image manually.
Information.DownloadNoImage: '$[1]' was found on TheAudioDB but has no image associated with it.
Information.Heading: Artist Information
Information.Name: Name

Information.DownloadMessage:
An album image will be searched for and downloaded using TheAudioDB.

For best results:
- Ensure the album's name is correct
- Make sure you have a stable internet connection

You will be unable to control playback while the image is downloading.
Information.DownloadNotFound: An album could not be found with the name '$[1]'. Please check your spelling or set an image manually.
Information.DownloadNoImage: '$[1]' was found on TheAudioDB but has no image associated with it.
Information.Heading: Album Information
Information.Name: Album Name

Common.ChangesSaved: Your changes have been saved. You may need to restart the application for any changes to take complete effect.
Common.ClearQueue: This action will clear the current play queue. Do you wish to continue?

Error.AudioDB:
An unknown error occurred during downloading. This could be due to:
- A poor internet connection
- The server is overloaded
- An issue with this application

Please try again later.
Error.BlankName: You can't set a blank name. Nice try ;)
Error.CorruptArt: An error occurred processing the file. This may mean the file is corrupt or the stored album art is not supported.
Error.Database: An error occurred fetching the data. Please restart the app and try again.
Error.DatabaseLocked: Unable to update the database, see the logs for more information!
Error.NoArt: No album art was found in the selected file.
Error.ReadImage: An error occurred reading the selected image. This may be due to a corrupted image or incorrect file extension.

Common.ExitPrompt: Are you sure you want to exit?
Common.Title: Title

Playlist.DeletePrompt: Are you sure you want to delete this playlist? This action cannot be undone!
Playlist.DeletePromptName: Are you sure you want to delete the playlist '$[1]'? This action cannot be undone!
Playlist.NotFound: No playlists found, use the button above to create one!

Search.Description: Search for playlists, artists, albums or songs...
Search.KeyboardError: An unexpected error occurred showing the keyboard. If this persists, please restart the application.
Search.SearchError: An error occurred searching the database. Please restart the application and try again.

Information.Error: One or more fields are blank, please ensure all fields are filled in!
Information.Heading: Song Information

Error.Connect2: Press 'Launch' to attempt to start it in the background
Error.Unknown2: Check the log files for more information
Error.Version1: The sysmodule and application versions do not match
Error.Version2: Please ensure that all components of TriPlayer are up to date

Splash.Hint: Please don't quit until the scan is complete!

Error.Check1: Unable to check for an update!
Error.Check2: Check your internet connection and/or try again later.
Error.Download2: Check your internet connection and/or try again later.
Error.Extract2: The update file couldn't be extracted, please try downloading it again!

Update.Heading: Update TriPlayer
Update.Success2: Both the sysmodule and this application will terminate.
